Entry.JapaneseText: 世界が滅ぶというのは……世界中が ラジルダのようになるという事なのか？
Entry.EnglishText: If the whole world is going to be destroyed... Then does that mean it's going to end up like Razilda!?

Entry.JapaneseText: もっと……もっと深刻な問題なんだ…… すべては無に帰る……
Entry.EnglishText: The situation is much. much worse than that... Everything will return to nothingness...
Nothingness? What do you mean by that?

Entry.JapaneseText: つまり、なんにもない状態。 <Yellow>ヒト<White>も世界も……ぼくたち聖獣も……
Entry.EnglishText: I mean a state of nonexistence. Neither <Yellow>Humanity<White>, nor this world, nor even us Sacred Beasts would exist...

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼくたちにすら、全く想像がつかないんだ…… とにかく、ランドグリーズに話を聞こう！
Entry.EnglishText: Even we had never imagined it would come to this... Anyway, let's go talk to Randgriz about this!
